item.title: Best Alfred Hitchcock Hour Episodes
item.description: A continuation of the dramatic anthology series ‘Alfred Hitchcock Presents’, hosted by the master of suspense and mystery. Alfred Hitchcock Hour is an American horror thriller tv-series that was first aired in 1962. See the best episodes of Alfred Hitchcock Hour below.

item.title: Best Room 104 Episodes
item.description: An anthology series set in a single hotel room, where every guest who comes to stay reveals a unique set of circumstances and quirks. Room 104 is an American horror thriller tv-series that was first aired in 2017 on HBO. See the best episodes of Room 104 below.

item.title: Best Criminal Minds Episodes
item.description: An elite team of FBI profilers analyze the country’s most twisted criminal minds, anticipating their next moves before they strike again. The Behavioral Analysis Unit’s most experienced agent is David Rossi, a founding member of the BAU who returns to help the team solve new cases. See the best episodes of Criminal Minds below.
